斯く: (かく) - like this; such; thus; in this way
斯くなる上は: (かくなるうえは) - now that it's come to this; since it's come to this
斯くも: (かくも) - so (e.g. so much, so close, so many, so few)
斯くやあらん: (かくやあらん) - it must be like this
斯く斯く: (かくかく) - so and so; such and such
斯の: (この) - this (something or someone close to the speaker (including the speaker), or ideas expressed by the speaker)
斯の如く: (かくのごとく) - thus; in this way; like this
斯文: (しぶん) - this academic subject or field of study; Confucian studies
斯業: (しぎょう) - this business or profession
斯様: (かよう) - in such a manner; like this
斯道: (しどう) - this art or field of study
新: (Shin/atara/ara/nii) - new , new, neo-; newness, novelty; Xin dynasty (China, 9-23 CE), Hsin dynasty
新かや: (しんかや) - North American nutmeg (Torreya californica) (used for shogi and go boards); Californian nutmeg
新しい: (atarashii) - novo, inédito, fresco, recente, mais recente, atualizado, moderno
新しいもの好き: (あたらしいものずき) - neophilia; love of new things
新しい女: (あたらしいおんな) - liberated woman
新しい物好き: (あたらしいものずき) - neophilia; love of new things
新しい酒は古い革袋に入れる: (あたらしいさけはふるいかわぶくろにいれる) - to put new wine into old wineskins; to put new wine into old bottles
新しがり屋: (あたらしがりや) - one who loves novelty; one who goes after all the latest fads
新しがる: (あたらしがる) - to be fond of new things; to hunt after novelties
新ためて: (あらためて) - another time/again/over again/once again/anew; formally/especially/intentionally/deliberately
新らしい: (あたらしい) - new; novel; fresh; recent; latest; up-to-date; modern
新カヤ: (しんカヤ) - North American nutmeg (Torreya californica) (used for shogi and go boards); Californian nutmeg
新カント学派: (しんカントがくは) - neo-Kantian school
新ジャンル: (しんジャンル) - cheap, malt-free beer-like alcoholic beverage
新スタートレック: (しんスタートレック) - Star Trek: The Next Generation
新三役: (しんさんやく) - {sumo} wrestler newly promoted to a san'yaku rank
新世代コンピュータ技術開発機構: (しんせだいコンピュータぎじゅつかいはつきこう) - The Institute for New Generation Computer Technology; ICOT
新世代コンピュータ開発機構: (しんせだいコンピュータかいはつきこう) - ICOT
新世帯: (しんしょたい) - new household; new home
新世界: (しんせかい) - a new world; the New World
新世界猿: (しんせかいざる) - New World monkey (any monkey of infraorder Platyrrhini)
新人: (しんじん) - new face/newcomer/rookie/fresh recruit; modern humans (from Cro-Magnon man onwards)
新人賞: (しんじんしょう) - Rookie of the Year award
新人類: (しんじんるい) - new breed of humans (used to refer to the younger generation, who have different ideals and sensibilities)
新仏: (にいぼとけ) - spirit of someone on the first O-Bon after their death; the recently departed (and buried or cremated, etc.)
新仮名遣: (しんかなづかい) - modern kana usage (as laid out by the Japanese government in 1946)
新仮名遣い: (しんかなづかい) - modern kana usage (as laid out by the Japanese government in 1946)
新伝: (しんでん) - new style; new way; modern; ultra modern
新体制: (しんたいせい) - new order; new system
新体操: (しんたいそう) - rhythmic sports gymnastics
新体詩: (しんたいし) - new style poetry; new style poem
新作: (しんさく) - new work; new production
新党さきがけ: (しんとうさきがけ) - New Party Sakigake (Japanese political party, 1993-2004)
新党大地: (しんとうだいち) - New Party Daichi; New Party Big Earth (Japanese political party)
新党日本: (しんとうにっぽん) - New Party Nippon (Japanese political party)
新入: (しんにゅう) - newly arrived; newly joined; newly entered
新入幕: (しんにゅうまく) - {sumo} wrestler newly promoted to makuuchi division
新入生: (しんにゅうせい) - new student; freshman; first-year student
新入社員: (しんにゅうしゃいん) - new employee; freshman employee; new hire
新入社員教育: (しんにゅうしゃいんきょういく) - training of new employees
新内: (しんない) - type of Joruri recitation
新内節: (しんないぶし) - type of Joruri recitation
新円: (しんえん) - new yen (issued in 1946 to fight inflation)
新冷戦: (しんれいせん) - new Cold war
新刀: (しんとう) - newly forged sword; sword made after the year 1615
新刊: (しんかん) - new book; new publication
新刊書: (しんかんしょ) - new book; new publication
新刊紹介: (しんかんしょうかい) - book review
新制中学: (しんせいちゅうがく) - junior high school (operated under post-war guidelines)
新制大学: (しんせいだいがく) - university (operated under post-war guidelines)
新制高校: (しんせいこうこう) - high school (operated under post-war guidelines)
新劇: (しんげき) - new type or school of drama
新十両: (しんじゅうりょう) - {sumo} wrestler newly promoted to juryo division
